title: "Mages suck right now"
body:
Man...
If only...
there was...
some sort of...
mage update...
going on...
right now...

replies.body:
They definitely feel weaker, but as my favorite class I will remain loyal to them! 

I am pretty hyped for what is to come mid season. A bit stronger Mage line-up could be exactly what the game needs for overall balance.

yeah remember the last mage update promising good stuff after the DFG was removed but it just came out to be nerf after nerf and the inclusion of item not even half as good as the DFG ... that just later got nerfed (ludens)  

yeah that.
It's actually not going on right now nor will it take effect for a couple of months. So yea, mages SUCK right now in patch 6.6. You know, the patch we're currently playing.
I wish people who know absolutely nothing about the mage update would stop talking about how it relates to balance.
